        f - - the File to add
        name - - the name to associate with the File

      • getData

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> getData(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the data map associated with the specified name, or null if no such data exists.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name whose associated data map is to be returned
        Returns:
        - the data map, which uses String keys to access its values

      • loadFile

        public boolean loadFile(java.lang.String name)
        Loads the File associated with the specified name into a two-dimensional array of Strings and returns the two-dimensional array.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name associated with the File to load
        Returns:
        true if the File is loaded successfully, false otherwise

      • addData

        Adds the specified custom data map to the File Manager.
        Parameters:

        d - - the custom data map

      • process

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> process(int phase)
        Transforms the spreadsheet associated with the specified name into some number of data maps, and returns the set of keys needed to access the newly created data maps.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name associated with the spreadsheet to process
        Returns:
        the set of keys needed to access the newly created data maps.
